summary: Memorandum regarding Julio Pablo Rodriguez Reyes, a member of the United Revolutionary Movement (URM), who arrived in the US as an exile and may have information of interest. He provided details on URM's structure, leaders, and activities, including contacts with a Catholic Chaplain and involvement in supplying radio transmitters to anti-Castro guerrillas.
title: Memorandum of Visit to: Julio Pablo RODRIGUEZ Reyes
